opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: In Re Discipline of Kovler. No. D-2335

opinion:
537 U.S. 1085

IN RE DISCIPLINE OF KOVLER.
No. D-2335.

Supreme Court of United States.

December 16, 2002.

1

Mark A. Kovler, of White Plains, N. Y., is suspended from the practice of law in this Court, and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
